result.eng: That event put and end to the night.
result.ga: Chuir an eachtra sin deireadh leis an oíche
result.orig: Chuir an eachtra sin deireadh leis an oíche
result.html: Chuir an eachtra sin deireadh leis an oícheThat event put and end to the night.
result.ponchtml: Ċuir an eaċtra sin deireaḋ leis an oíċeThat event put and end to the night.

result.eng: She gave us an account of her adventures in Africa.
result.ga: Thug sí cuntas dúinn ar a heachtraí san Afraic
result.orig: Thug sí cuntas dúinn ar a heachtraí san Afraic
result.html: Thug sí cuntas dúinn ar a heachtraí san AfraicShe gave us an account of her adventures in Africa.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug sí cuntas dúinn ar a heaċtraí san AfraicShe gave us an account of her adventures in Africa.

result.eng: She still felt nauseous from the incident.
result.ga: Bhí masmas uirthi fós de thoradh na heachtra
result.orig: Bhí masmas uirthi fós de thoradh na heachtra
result.html: Bhí masmas uirthi fós de thoradh na heachtraShe still felt nauseous from the incident.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí masmas uirṫi fós de ṫoraḋ na heaċtraShe still felt nauseous from the incident.

result.eng: The incident that happened was a relic of the old era.
result.ga: Iarsma den tseanré a bhí san eachtra a tharla
result.orig: Iarsma den tseanré a bhí san eachtra a tharla
result.html: Iarsma den tseanré a bhí san eachtra a tharlaThe incident that happened was a relic of the old era.
result.ponchtml: Iarsma den tseanré a ḃí san eaċtra a ṫarlaThe incident that happened was a relic of the old era.

result.eng: He remembers an incident that happened one day.
result.ga: Is cuimhin leis eachtra a tharla lá
result.orig: Is cuimhin leis eachtra a tharla lá
result.html: Is cuimhin leis eachtra a tharla láHe remembers an incident that happened one day.
result.ponchtml: Is cuiṁin leis eaċtra a ṫarla láHe remembers an incident that happened one day.
